fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Attack a player for 1 HP, with their adjacent players being attacked for 1 HP.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Attack a player for 3 HP, with their adjacent players being attacked for 1 HP. 

*Bomb acts as an AoE attack, where it hits players in a radius. (i.e you hit Player 2, it will hit Player 1 and Player 3 due to AoE) Additionally, if the main target of the bomb defends, the adjacent players do not have to defend, but any already spent defenses are not refunded.*
